data.text:
@MikeCrapo Over 40,000 Iranians have been slaughtered. Not for a nuclear deal. We demand freedom and full regime change. If the Islamic regime survives, its missiles and nuclear ambitions will threaten the U.S. Reza Pahlavi is our leader and Iran’s democratic future.
#IranMassacre @POTUS https://t.co/5sB6K32fcB

@MikeCrapo Don’t you have MMTLP constituents in Idaho ? 

Situation still not resolved after 3 years.

@MikeCrapo What about the Idahoans that 3 years still waiting for the $MMTLP Answers and resolution for the U3 Halt , we hope you going to raise the #MMTLP question again at the Financial Committee on this coming Wednesday 11am 🙏🙏🙏 https://t.co/u1sFN4Sx1g
